abstracts.cdata!:
The project would comprise the following
            components: (i) assistance to the OCDRR for project
            preparation and implementation; (ii) construction of rural
            roads; (iii) provision of rural water supplies; (iv)
            execution of a comprehensive pilot settlement project; (v)
            execution of data collection activities, surveys etc. to
            gather information for the preparation of additional
            projects; (vi) implementation of an agricultural research
            program; (vii) implementation of a cottage industry program;
            (viii) construction of health facilities; and (ix)
            construction of roads, trails, water supply facilities and
            simple irrigation works in the northeast rangelands.
